channel.title: gpg on Panda的随笔
channel.description: Recent content in gpg on Panda的随笔

item.title: gpg和apt-key
item.description: 一、gpg 1、导出公钥 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 $ gpg --list-key $ gpg -a --export 457EF52C > chenbin.pub gpg --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys 5AFA7A83 gpg --delete-keys 5AFA7A83 2、生成随机数 1 2 3 $ sudo apt-get install rng-tools //避免gpg秘钥生成过程中长时间等待
